question_en: How much does it cost to transport teff?
answer_en: Depends on distance and vehicle; use our pricing tool.
answer_am: እንግዳ እና ተሽከርካሪ ላይ የሚወሰን ነው፣ የዋጋ መሳሪያችንን ተጠቀሙ።
answer_om: Fageenya fi gaariitti walqabata; meeshaa gatii keenya fayyadami.

answer_en: Check our matching system for available drivers.
answer_am: የሚገኙ ሹፌሮችን ለማግኘት የመያዣ ስርዓታችንን ያረጋግጡ።
answer_om: Sisteeemii walqabsiisaa keenya irratti duraa jiran ilaali.
